about.title: ABOUT EXPEDITORS GLOBAL
about.subtitle: Origin – Our founding story
about.summary: Founded in 2025 after a journey begun in 2015; building a global contract logistics & transportation provider.
about.content:
EXPEDITORS GLOBAL's journey began in 2015 with humble, persistent steps. Through years of learning, working, and contributing within global logistics corporations in Vietnam, we built a solid foundation for a larger vision.

In 2025, after a long period of incubation and preparation, we made a landmark decision: to establish EXPEDITORS GLOBAL – aiming to become a global contract logistics and transportation provider, focusing on key markets across Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, and South America.

Our success did not come overnight. It is the result of relentless effort, innovation, and the unity of a team passionate about logistics and transportation.

We carry the ambition to solve the toughest supply-chain challenges – from operations to optimization – with dedication, expertise, and practical solutions.

Today, EXPEDITORS GLOBAL stands as living proof of long-term vision, perseverance, and enduring collaboration. As we continue to evolve in a fast-changing supply-chain world, we remain true to our core identity: a business built on passion, nurtured by ambition, and grown by the tireless dedication of our people.

EXPEDITORS GLOBAL – Start with a dream. Step forward with faith. Succeed through effort.

mission.title: THE MISSION OF EXPEDITORS GLOBAL
mission.subtitle: Connecting people – products – suppliers worldwide
mission.summary: Connect the logistics value chain to drive balanced trade and sustainable growth.
mission.content:
Our mission is to connect people, products, and suppliers across the globe. EXPEDITORS GLOBAL is a trusted provider of comprehensive logistics and supply-chain services in Vietnam and worldwide. We believe a robust supply chain is the foundation of a sustainable global economy.

We are committed to advancing a harmonious globalization by connecting the logistics value chain, promoting balanced international trade, and accompanying the growth of our customers, communities, and regions. We manage supply chains with flexibility and optimization, constantly seeking solutions to save costs and enhance operational efficiency, while ensuring socio-economic development goes hand in hand with responsibility for people and the planet.

Our role in global trade: we strive to be the leading strategic partner in the global logistics chain, continuously innovating to build professional, flexible, and reliable solutions.

strategy.title: EXPEDITORS GLOBAL STRATEGY
strategy.subtitle: Foundations for sustainable growth
strategy.summary: Five seamlessly integrated strategic pillars for long-term growth.
strategy.content:
To realize our vision of leadership in global logistics, EXPEDITORS GLOBAL operates on five mutually reinforcing pillars that form the bedrock of sustainable growth:

1) Elevate logistics chain management: Rethink and optimize processes; tailor services to specific needs; leverage the combined strengths of ocean, port, and warehousing in Vietnam and the United States to build a comprehensive, seamless, and efficient value chain.

2) Provide end-to-end logistics solutions: Deliver ocean, road, and air services for all cargo types; develop a global multimodal network that flexibly meets even the most complex demands.

3) Drive innovation & digital transformation: Put AI and blockchain at the core; strengthen security, speed, and user experience; deploy intuitive, modern digital tools to optimize workflows for employees and customers.

4) Respect people & the planet: Implement environmentally friendly, community-safe solutions; ensure international trade does not come at environmental or humanitarian cost.

5) Empower our people: Invest in safety, well-being, and capability building (Expeditors Academy) so every individual can realize their potential and contribute sustainably to our company and society.

services_ocean.title: OCEAN FREIGHT
services_ocean.subtitle: We make the world smaller
services_ocean.content:
EXPEDITORS GLOBAL delivers tailored solutions for your ocean-freight needs: LCL, FCL, comprehensive ocean-freight management, bulk/project cargo, and full/part charter.

With weekly departures on 600+ routes connecting 10,000+ ports, your cargo is moved safely and efficiently – across the seas and beyond.

Our services include:
• Comprehensive ocean-freight management
• Bulk and project cargo
• Full/Part charter

Regardless of your company size, our dedicated implementation team ensures a smooth, fast rollout while keeping you updated on shipment status in real time.

services_air.title: AIR FREIGHT
services_air.subtitle: Working day and night – whenever you need us
services_air.summary: Global network, multiple service speeds, door-to-door & real-time tracking.
services_air.content:
Air freight is fast, challenging, and ever-changing – it pushes us to innovate and remain agile to deliver the most suitable solution. Although capacity and demand can shift rapidly, we are committed to stable, reliable services that safeguard supply-chain integrity.

Services include:
• Transport by commercial or charter aircraft
• Multi-speed products (economy / standard / express)
• Door-to-door services
• Real-time shipment management & tracking

Whether using commercial flights or dedicated freighters, our experienced air-freight team delivers the right solution quickly and reliably to meet your business needs.

services_road_rail.title: ROAD & RAIL
services_road_rail.subtitle: Sustainable, cost-effective transport solutions
services_road_rail.content:
In a volatile and complex market, resilience and efficiency are paramount. We provide standard or tailor-made road & rail solutions that meet your requirements for reliability, speed, emissions reduction, visibility, and cost.

Our services include:
• Domestic and cross-border transport
• Full truckload (FTL) and less-than-truckload (LTL)
• Multimodal solutions: rail/road/waterway
• Carbon-optimized solutions compliant with standards (GDP, ADR, etc.)

We serve a wide range of products – from electronic components and construction materials to interiors, pharmaceuticals, consumer goods, and dangerous goods – across diverse distribution channels from factories and hospitals to supermarkets and e-commerce.

contract_logistics.title: CONTRACT LOGISTICS & WAREHOUSING
contract_logistics.subtitle: Consistent supply-chain strategies
contract_logistics.summary: Optimize manufacturing support, distribution, reverse/circular logistics, and bonded warehousing.
contract_logistics.content:
EXPEDITORS GLOBAL provides comprehensive supply-chain solutions, optimizing your logistics journey with future-oriented and sustainable operations. We cover manufacturing support, distribution, reverse/circular logistics, and bonded warehouses—designing, executing, and monitoring strategies so you deliver on your commitments.

Combining global programs with deep local relationships, we strike the right balance between standardization and customization, proactively adapting to evolving markets and exceeding customer expectations.

why_us.title: WHY CHOOSE US
why_us.subtitle: Global expertise – local insight
why_us.summary: Flexible end-to-end solutions, dedicated team, sustainability & innovation.
why_us.content:
• Global experience with deep understanding of the Vietnamese market.
• Flexible end-to-end solutions from production and distribution to customs and multimodal.
• Dedicated experts delivering reliable, fast, and efficient services.
• Commitment to sustainability & innovation: eco-friendly solutions that optimize costs and enhance competitiveness.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.subtitle: A leader in Vietnam’s logistics & supply-chain industry
vision.summary: Expand global footprint with superior end-to-end solutions; engage diverse teams; grow sustainably.
vision.content:
To become the leading company in Vietnam’s logistics and supply-chain industry. Logistics is the backbone of global trade and essential to everyday life. With this vision, we aim for national leadership while expanding globally through superior end-to-end solutions across contract logistics, customs, project logistics, FVL, and air/road/ocean freight—meeting even the most complex needs.

Our customers’ needs and strategic ambitions sit at the heart of everything we do. We deliver holistic solutions grounded in innovation, sustainability, and collaboration; empower diverse teams to co-create value; invest in communities; and operate ethically for our planet.

customers_partners.title: CUSTOMERS & PARTNERS
customers_partners.subtitle: Trust – Professionalism – Dedication
customers_partners.summary: Building sustainable partnerships to expand regionally and globally.
customers_partners.content: We honor our commitments and deliver added value to customers and partners. Our goal is to build long-term, sustainable relationships at home and abroad as a foundation for regional and global expansion.

differentiation.title: WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT
differentiation.subtitle: What makes us different
differentiation.summary: A broad range of strategic, tactical, and operational expertise to address opportunities in a fully compliant way.
differentiation.content:
WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT

• Broad strategic, tactical, and operational expertise to address commercial opportunities in full compliance.
• Comprehensive worldwide solutions to maximize trade efficiency.
• A customer-centric organization to drive your sales growth.

We provide peace of mind through outstanding compliance and risk minimization. EXPEDITORS GLOBAL reduces financial risk by ensuring timely fulfillment of obligations, bringing transparency to processes, and creating cost-saving opportunities. Proactive regulatory oversight and rigorous, systematic compliance audits help minimize financial and compliance risks.

We offer global customs-brokerage services alongside our integrated transportation network or as a standalone solution—regardless of your freight forwarder. We design trade solutions that leverage the EXPEDITORS GLOBAL ecosystem to maximize efficiency.

We pride ourselves on being one of the most customer-centric brokerage organizations, with a professional team trained regularly on customs compliance and local regulations. Our culture of continuous improvement drives productivity, quality, and flexibility, ensuring innovative, responsive solutions that optimize your trading operations.

EXPEDITORS GLOBAL – COMPREHENSIVE, FLEXIBLE, RELIABLE LOGISTICS SOLUTIONS.
We don’t just move goods—we partner with you to build a more sustainable, smarter, more efficient supply chain every day.
